donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: This component of the electoral cycle programme aims to support the development of a national decentralized system for transmitting and collating election results as well as providing accurate up to date information on Election Day events across the country. This support will provide Zambia with an electronic electoral information management system for vote tallying, transmission, collation, information on opening and closure of polling stations as well as interim statistics on voter turnout.

project_descr: This component of the electoral cycle programme aims to support the development of a national decentralized system for transmitting and collating election results.
